snippet: How the Mets and the Cardinals have fared since the Mets’ loss to St. Louis in Game 7 of the N.L.C.S. in 2006.
abstract: Comparison of New York Mets and St Louis Cardinals records since Mets loss to Cardinals in Game 7 of National League Championship series in 2006 on called third strike.
lead_paragraph: How the Mets and the Cardinals have fared since the Mets’ loss to St. Louis in Game 7 of the N.L.C.S. in 2006.

headline.main: Mets and Cardinals Since the Called Third Strike
